front.title: An IPv6 Profile for 3GPP Mobile Devices
front.abstract: This document defines a profile that is a superset of the connection to IPv6 cellular networks defined in the IPv6 for Third Generation Partnership Project (3GPP) Cellular Hosts document. This document defines a profile that is a superset of the connections to IPv6 cellular networks defined in "IPv6 for Third Generation Partnership Project (3GPP) Cellular Hosts" (RFC 7066). Both mobile hosts and mobile devices with the capability to share their 3GPP mobile connectivity are in scope.
